Featured in Chrome Web Store

Fill Forms Faster, Save Time

A smart Chrome extension that automatically fills web forms with your saved data or realistic test data. Never type the same information twice.

5(5 ratings)
Install ExtensionView Manual

See It In Action

Powerful Features

Smart Auto-Fill

Automatically detects and fills matching form fields across any website.

Custom Field Management

Save any form field with custom names and values. Organize with drag & drop.

Website-Specific Fields

Scope fields to specific domains. Different credentials for different sites.

Test Data Generator

Fill forms with realistic fake data for testing and demos.

Password Protection

Password fields are masked in the UI. Secure local storage only.

Privacy First

All data stored locally. Never sent to external servers.

Perfect For

Job Applicants

Fill multiple job applications quickly. Save time on repetitive form fields and reduce typos in contact information.

Developers & QA Testers

Generate realistic test data instantly. Test forms without manual data entry and speed up development workflows.

Students

Apply to multiple programs efficiently. Fill scholarship and application forms faster with saved credentials.

Professionals

Fill CRM and ATS forms quickly. Manage multiple accounts with different credentials and streamline data entry.
